review.title: “very satisfying.”
review.pros: Pros – We run schools wherein education is imparted to underpriveledged children. We try with the help of donors to give the best possible education in a very pleasent enviornment.
review.cons: Cons – This is an ever changing world, where we have to keep updated. The results are only achieved with the help and cooperation of the entire team. In some instances it is not possible to get full cooperation and understanding.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Not to loose heart and to keep working untireingly for the cause.
